name: Car Chase! [beta]
description:
Scroll all the way down to see download button!

Let's get the engine up and run in the low poly world!

Put your key and show up your talent in front of people police. You are a famous street racer who race for fun and money. The street racers are going too far and hurting and damaging public and it's property. You done bad things dude. So police is chasing you.

Lots of police is chasing you. They'll come more. You damaged and will damage lots and lots of police cars and trucks. So you are now an official criminal of your country. Be awake drive more and open up more powerful engines.

Car Chase! is an official game of Kutty Company which is a subsidy of Tutivee.

Check this page for updates and changelogs: https://kuttycompany.tutivee.com/car-chase/

Screenshots: How to play:

First extract the game in your desktop. And then open it :)

Just use arrow keys to move around.

System requirements:

As it is a low poly game. You cab easily use it on olden computes also. You just need a minimum of

  • First a computer XD
  • Minimum 2GB RAM
  • 1GB free disk storage
  • Windows system with 7, 8, 8.1, 10 or 11
Changelog:

19/09/2021 - Beta version has been released

Features: (Under dev)
  • New World
  • New characters including bikes and humans
  • Customizable car colors
  • Leaderboard
